name: Category Monthly Archives
author: Hiroshi Sawai

sections.description:
This Plugin adds Category Monthly Archives to Widget.
Added widget displays category monthly archives links on category page.
Only displays links on category page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload category-monthly-archives to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add Category Monthly Archives to Appearance > Widgets
sections.faq:
Where to links displays ?

This Widget only display links on category page.
sections.changelog:
0.0.3

Improve Date Format.
The archives list date format is reflected by Dashbord > Settings > General > Date Format.

0.0.1

  • first version.

short_description: This Widget display category monthly archives links on category page.
description:
This Plugin adds Category Monthly Archives to Widget.

upgrade_notice: This version up may change archives list data format. The archives list date format is reflected by Dashbord > Settings > General > Date Format.
